name: HalloweenFiend
description:
This game has been made by iNeedYourSkullz over 2 weeks for VImJam2 when time permitted :).

Music and art done by me!

Halloween Fiend is about being trapped in an other worldly plane, the edge of reality, floating through space. The world is monitored and controlled by the Halloween Fiend himself, the boss of the world. Defeat his bumbling lackeys and just maybe you will be home in time for Halloween!

Controls:

'wasd' to move 

 Left mouse to fire  

Spacebar to reload

 'r' to restart 

'c' to close the shop

There is plenty of jank but please leave feedback and comments where appropriate :)
